text:
In addition to the information that you provide directly to us, we collect some information automatically when you use the Services.
The types of information that we collect automatically may include: Information about your approximate location, which we may derive from device information such as IP address.
The types of information that we collect automatically may include: Usage and activity data, information and statistics about your interaction with the Services which may include the URLs of the Services that you have visited, URLs of referring and exiting pages, page views, time spent on a page, number of clicks, the applications and features you use, the dates, times and duration of your visits, when and how long you use those applications and features, your use of and interactions within the virtual spaces and Kumospace Floors on the Kumospace Platform, including, without limitation, the time you spend in Kumospace Floors and other usage statistics;
We also collect certain information automatically when you interact with the Services.

We may use the Personal Information that we collect or receive through the Services for the following purposes: To provide, administer, evaluate, troubleshoot, improve and enhance our business and the Services (including data analytics, testing, system maintenance, developing new products and services; managing our communications; and performing accounting, auditing, billing, reconciliation and collection activities);

We may use the Personal Information that we collect or receive through the Services for the following purposes: To provide, administer, evaluate, troubleshoot, improve and enhance our business and the Services (including data analytics, testing, system maintenance, developing new products and services; managing our communications; and performing accounting, auditing, billing, reconciliation and collection activities);

These third parties may collect information about your online activities over time and across different Web sites.
We and third-parties with whom we work may use Tracking Technologies on the Services to improve user experience, to help remember your preferences and allow us to bring you the content and features that are likely to be of interest to you, and to analyze the use of our Services and to improve the Services' functionality.

We describe in this section how we collect, use, and share California Personal Information to the extent we act as a "business" under the California Consumer Privacy Act of 2018 (" CCPA "), and the rights that consumers have under the CCPA; provided, however, that California Personal Information does not include, and this section of the Privacy Policy does not apply to:

We retain service data for the duration of the customer's business relationship with us and for a period of time thereafter, to analyze the data for our own operations, and for historical and archiving purposes associated with our services.

To exercise the access, data portability, and deletion rights described above, please submit a verifiable consumer request to us by sending an email to privacy@kumospace.com , or sending your request by mail as set out in the How to Contact Us section below, with your first name, last name, and email address, and a detailed explanation of your request.
